definitions.body: :Hb Hab 3:4 brightness;—´[[נ]] abs. Am 5:10 +; cstr. Is 4:5 +; sf. [[נׇגְהָם]] Joe 2:10, Joe 3:15; —brightness of a (clear, sunshiny) day Am 5:10 (‖[[אוֹר]]; opp. [[אָפֵל]], [[חשֶׁךְ]]), 2Sa 23:4 ([[מִמָּטָר]] after rain); so fig. of Zion's dawning, [[זַרְחֵךְ]] ´[[נ]] Is 60:3 (‖[[אוֹר]]); of her righteousness [[כַּנּׁגַהּ]] Is 62:1 (c. art. only here and Ez Eze 1:28), ‖[[כְּלַפִּיד יִבְעָָר]]; of moon Is 60:19, of stars Joe 2:10, Joe 3:15; of theophany 2Sa 22:13 = Ps 18:13 (in storm); cf. Ez Eze 1:4, Eze 1:27, Eze 1:28, ´[[כְּבוֹד י]] ´[[נ]] Eze 10:4; [[כאור]] ´[[נ]] Hb Hab 3:4; [[לָאֵשׁ]] ´[[נ]] Ez Eze 1:13, [[אֵשׁ לֶהָבָה]] ´[[נ]] Is 4:5; [[בְּרַק]] ´[[נ]] [[חֲנִיתְֶָ]] Hb Hab 3:11 (of glitter of ´[[י]]'s spear; ‖[[אוֹר חִצֶּיְ]]); of individ., [[לוֹ]] ´[[וְאֵין נ]] Is 50:10 (fig. of distress ‖[[חֲשֵׁכִים]]); so ´[[וְאׂרַח חַדִּיקִים כְּאוֹר נ]] Pr 4:18 the path of righteous men is like a light of brightness.
